messages.zh: 4-6 少见多怪（上）
messages.en: 4-6 Fuss (part 1)

messages.zh: 我们到了。
messages.en: We’re here.

messages.zh: ......真是个阴沉的地方。
messages.en: ……What a gloomy place.

messages.zh: 外交频道呢？
messages.en: The diplomatic channel?

messages.zh: 没消息。
messages.en: Nothing to hear.

messages.zh: 看来，这里已经被乌萨斯抛弃了。
messages.en: It seems, that this place has been abandoned by Ursus already.
An abandoned city……huh.

messages.zh: 如果它已经成了整合运动的窝点，对于龙门而言，情况会变得越来越难以处理。
messages.en: If it has become a shelter for Reunion Movement, for Lungmen, the situation’s going to get harder and harder to deal with.

messages.zh: 离龙门太近了。如果碎骨的行动是接受了这里的指挥——放任不管的后果不堪设想。
messages.en: Too close to Lungmen. If Bone Breaker was acting on orders given from here——I can’t imagine what would happen if we leave it alone.

messages.zh: 只不过，切尔诺伯格的这个分城——究竟发生了什么事？
messages.en: It’s just that, this sub city of Chernobog——what has happened to it exactly?

messages.zh: 遭受天灾之后是不可能移动这么长的距离的。
messages.en: It couldn’t have moved such a long distance after being hit by Calamity.

messages.zh: 它为什么会出现在这里？
messages.en: Why is it here?

messages.zh: 从观测得来的数据分析......这里遭受过天灾的余波。
messages.en: Analyzing the data observed……this place withstood the repercussion of the Calamity.

messages.zh: 分城是在移动到这里后才被天灾摧毁的。
messages.en: The sub city was destroyed by Calamity after moving to this location.

messages.zh: 哈。罗德岛看来还有些很不错的天灾信使嘛。
messages.en: Hah. Looks like Rhodes Island has got some skillful Calamity messengers.

messages.zh: 谨慎是正确的选择。
messages.en: Caution is the right choice.

messages.zh: 一路上都有散漫的整合运动埋伏......像是食腐野兽一样盘踞在这废城之上。
messages.en: There are scattered Reunion Movement ambushing all along the way……like scavengers crouching on this deserted city.

messages.zh: 真的令人有点不太舒服。
messages.en: That makes me feel uneasy.

messages.zh: 我确认了坐标，还得继续深入——
messages.en: I checked the coordinates, we still need to go deeper——

messages.zh: 但这个地形，我认为，不适合整个部队一同行动。
messages.en: But this terrain, I don’t think it’s fit for all of us to go together.

messages.zh: 接下来就是源石多生地带了吧？
messages.en: It’d be the originium-tufted region ahead right?

messages.zh: （竟然是你。）
messages.en: (It’s you.)

messages.zh: 老陈，你觉得——
messages.en: Ch’en, what do you——

messages.zh: 老陈？
messages.en: Ch’en?

messages.zh: 怎么会——
messages.en: How could it——
——Impossible——!

messages.zh: 老陈，你去哪！
messages.en: Ch’en, where are you going!

messages.zh: 该死，跑得真快！那个难道是——
messages.en: Damn it, she’s fast! Could that be——

messages.zh: ......我也没有看清楚！但我觉得那个身影确实是......
messages.en: ……I didn’t catch it either! But I think that figure is really……

messages.zh: 我们得追上去——
messages.en: We have to catch up——

messages.zh: 停下！
messages.en: Stop!

messages.zh: 居然选择在这个时候拦住我们......！
messages.en: Blocking our way at this time……!

messages.zh: 那个家伙，不是一般的整合运动成员——
messages.en: That guy, he’s no ordinary Reunion Movement member——

messages.zh: 阿米娅！让罗德岛的伙计们都小心点！！
messages.en: Amiya! Let the Rhodes Island fellas watch out!!
